MSR.A: The cells are: {(Literature, Admin), (Literature, Freshman), (Physics, Freshman), (Literature, Junior), (Mathematics, Junior), (Physics, PhD), (Mathematics, Postdoc), (Literature, Researcher), (Mathematics, Researcher), (Literature, Sophomore), (Physics, Sophomore)}.
